channel.title: Web client problem
channel.description: Hello. I tried to make a server (127.0.0.1) and it said error connecting. How is this possible, and is it because I am on a Mac? I don't think so though because the same thing happened on my windows laptop :eek:[br][size=1]Posted on: January 08, 2007, 04:46:48 PM[/size][hr]Has this been happening with anybody else? [br][size=1]Posted on: January 08, 2007, 04:59:58 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?? :([br][size=1]Posted on: January 08, 2007, 07:23:01 PM[/size][hr] :( :( :( I wanna play really bad and I can't

item.title: Web client problem
item.dc:creator: @Azkamon Azkamon
item.description:
@Azkamon wrote:

[glow=red,2,300]Your Problem Solved[/glow]

the problem may be that you are not allowing remote users to connect to your server this can be solved simply by click start, go to search, Search Gpedit, once done click on administrative templates then go to remote users it will say not configured click on to enable remote users.

Thanks Sy.

Read full topic
